    A Demo Dataset (Spline)

    demo_spline.Rd

    This is a simple dataset with nonlinear relationships between the outcome and mediators. It is used simply to illustrate the design of multimedia. The mediator->outcome effect is generated from a random spline function.

    demo_spline(n_samples = 5000, tau = c(2, 2))

    Arguments

    n_samples

    The number of samples to generate in the toy example

    tau

    The true direct efefcts associated with the two outcomes. Defaults to 2, 2.

    Value

    xy A tibble whose columns include the treatment, mediation, and outcome variables.

    Examples

    demo_spline()
#> # A tibble: 5,000 × 4
#>    outcome_1 outcome_2 mediator treatment
#>        <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl> <fct>    
#>  1    -0.830   -0.209   -3.00   0        
#>  2    -0.799   -0.0772  -1.82   0        
#>  3    -1.54    -1.63    -0.796  0        
#>  4    -0.658    0.190   -2.08   0        
#>  5    -0.352    0.790   -1.29   0        
#>  6    -0.795   -0.634   -0.0596 0        
#>  7    -0.588    0.290   -2.72   0        
#>  8    -0.401    0.525   -3.71   0        
#>  9    -0.982   -0.716   -0.430  0        
#> 10    -0.749   -0.575   -0.0279 0        
#> # ℹ 4,990 more rows
demo_spline(20)
